meanings.definition: A person or animal that slobbers excessively.
meanings.sent1: The slobberer left a trail of drool wherever they went.
meanings.sent2: The dog was a slobberer, leaving wet marks on the floor.
meanings.sent3: The slobberer's antics always brought a smile to our faces.
meanings.sent4: The slobberer's drool was like a river flowing non-stop.
meanings.sent5: The image of the slobberer's messy face stuck in my mind.

meanings.definition: To drool or let saliva run from the mouth.
meanings.sent1: Please don't slobberer on the clean tablecloth.
meanings.sent2: The baby tends to slobberer when teething.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked that he would slobberer if he saw his crush.
meanings.sent4: The leaky faucet slobberer water all night long.
meanings.sent5: The delicious smell made my mouth slobberer uncontrollably.
